page.title: 10Transport
page.content:
Fife Scottish Bus Services operate the bus services through the area, providing links with Dunfermline, Ballingry, Glenrothes, St. Andrews, Kirkcaldy and Edinburgh. Also in the months of June, July, August there is an Express Coach Service to Ayr, Blackpool, Morecambe, Scarborough and Filey.
Scotrail operate a passenger service to Edinburgh and coal freight is carried along this line from Westfield Opencast Mine to Longannet Power Station, situated on the upper reaches of the R. Forth.
The A 910 and B 920 Roads cross this area with access to the M90 Motorway at a distance of 10km.
